attributes.action: Save sunderland international airshow fom being cancelled
attributes.additional_details: Because it will affect the economy if Sunderland lose the airshow
attributes.background: Talk with Sunderland city council to see if they can come to some sort of resolution

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local events are a matter for the organisers and relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
